alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued November 09 at 12:00PM CST until November 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust expected. * WHERE...Webster and Nuckolls Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Nebraska Department of transportation has closed a portion of Highway 136 between Guide Rock and Superior due to gusty southerly winds picking up dust off a recent burn scar. Motorists in this area should use extreme caution and follow any road closures. Winds are not expected to relax significantly before midnight, but should switch directions behind a cold front expected to cross the area during the overnight hours. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.
